sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { ServerIcon, UserGroupIcon, ShieldCheckIcon, ExclamationTriangleIcon, ArrowUpIcon, ArrowDownIcon, CheckCircleIcon, XCircleIcon, ClockIcon, CpuChipIcon, WifiIcon, CircleStackIcon } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline'; import { useWebSocket } from '../hooks/useWebSocket'; import apiService from '../utils/api'; export default function Dashboard() { const { isConnected, metrics } = useWebSocket(); const [systemMetrics, setSystemMetrics] = useState({ cpu: 0, memory: 0, disk: 0, network: 0, uptime: '0d 0h 0m', activeConnections: 0, totalRequests: 0, errorRate: 0 }); const [recentActivity, setRecentActivity] = useState([]); const [alerts, setAlerts] = useState([]); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); useEffect(() => { const fetchDashboardData = async () => { try { // Fetch system metrics const metricsData = await apiService.getSystemMetrics(); setSystemMetrics(metricsData); // Fetch recent activity const activityData = await apiService.getRecentActivity(); setRecentActivity(activityData); // Fetch alerts const alertsData = await apiService.getAlerts(); setAlerts(alertsData); } catch (error) { console.error('Error fetching dashboard data:', error); } finally { setLoading(false); } }; fetchDashboardData(); const interval = setInterval(fetchDashboardData, 30000); // Refresh every 30 seconds return () => clearInterval(interval); }, []); const getStatusColor = (status) => { switch (status) { case 'healthy': return 'text-green-600 bg-green-100 dark:bg-green-900 dark:text-green-200'; case 'warning': return 'text-yellow-600 bg-yellow-100 dark:bg-yellow-900 dark:text-yellow-200'; case 'critical': return 'text-red-600 bg-red-100 dark:bg-red-900 dark:text-red-200'; default: return 'text-gray-600 bg-gray-100 dark:bg-gray-900 dark:text-gray-200'; } }; const getMetricTrend = (current, previous) => { if (current > previous) return { direction: 'up', color: 'text-green-600', icon: ArrowUpIcon }; if (current < previous) return { direction: 'down', color: 'text-red-600', icon: ArrowDownIcon }; return { direction: 'stable', color: 'text-gray-600', icon: null }; }; if (loading) { return (
); } return (
{/* Page Header */}

System Dashboard

Real-time monitoring and system overview

{isConnected ? 'Connected' : 'Disconnected'}
{/* System Status Cards */}
CPU Usage
{systemMetrics.cpu}%
Memory Usage
{systemMetrics.memory}%
Disk Usage
{systemMetrics.disk}%
Network
{systemMetrics.network}%
{/* System Overview and Alerts */}
{/* System Overview */}

System Overview

Uptime {systemMetrics.uptime}
Active Connections {systemMetrics.activeConnections}
Total Requests {systemMetrics.totalRequests.toLocaleString()}
Error Rate {systemMetrics.errorRate}%
System Status Healthy
Last Update {new Date().toLocaleTimeString()}
{/* Recent Alerts */}

Recent Alerts

{alerts.length > 0 ? ( alerts.slice(0, 5).map((alert, index) => (

{alert.title}

{alert.message}

{new Date(alert.timestamp).toLocaleString()}

)) ) : (

No active alerts

)}
{/* Recent Activity */}

Recent Activity

    {recentActivity.map((activity, activityIdx) => (
  • {activityIdx !== recentActivity.length - 1 ? ( ) : null}
    {activity.type === 'success' ? ( ) : activity.type === 'warning' ? ( ) : activity.type === 'error' ? ( ) : ( )}

    {activity.message}

    {new Date(activity.timestamp).toLocaleString()}
    • ))}
); }
